entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
